body: Recently last night I saw a mega hacker flying to the monument and breaking it just flying everywhere. I sent out a report to a mod 2 times and  not a single mod came. My KD was getting even more messed up from that person. They got full diamond armour from creative somehow in venomous and was flying around. I forgot the name but it was a girl skin and it's name started with an m then and a I think please watch out because I have seen a lot of people flying of avicus lately -Strongy1210

replies.body: I'm sorry, but you'll need to supply a name with proof clearly showing the use of illegal hacked clients. Please use some sort of recording software and record them next time, and link the video here. I understand there are many hackers, but we can't do anything without any proof. Thanks!

replies.body: Sorry that a mod didn't come. There are a lot of reports though and if only one mod is answering you can't get to all of them. I suggest recording them and uploading to the forums under the section player reports. If you don't have a good recording thingy you can use Camtasia it works pretty well and is fairly simple

replies.body:
Look, if you want to really get it done. I have two ways.
1. Spam. Although it seems like a bad way to approach it, basically, every 1 minute send a report. For 5-10 minutes do this process and surely there will be a mod. They can't ignore the same person over and over again. And it at least gets them there. 

2. Take a Screenshot. Recording devices, IMO, no one actually wants to buy them... just to report a hacker. If you see them flying or hacking, picture it. It's less easier, but gets the job done and dandy.
replies.body_tagged:
Look, if you want to really get it done. I have two ways.
1. Spam. Although it seems like a bad way to approach it, basically, every 1 minute send a report. For 5-10 minutes do this process and surely there will be a mod. They can't ignore the same person over and over again. And it at least gets them there. 

2. Take a Screenshot. Recording devices, IMO, no one actually wants to buy them... just to report a hacker. If you see them flying or hacking, picture it. It's less easier, but gets the job done and dandy.

replies.body:
Strongy, don't freak, the probability of him actually being a stalker is approximately 30%, and the probability of him being a succesfull, good stalker, is about .05%
strongy, you can post screenshots with imgur , by copying the direct link
and, best not if you post the screenie here... make a player report
And... also, its pretty much impossible for him to see your computer files, your firewall would prevent him, and the chances of him being a well-talented (actual, not minecraft) hacker, is EXTREMELY slim

replies.body:
+1 Roman
Strongy, calm down. You realise that he assumed that you did that {screenshotted} because he's a fly hacker. It just makes sense. Don't worry about it. As Roman said, "~the probability of him {her} being a successful and good stalker is about 1/20 of a percent."

Most of the hackers that are in minecraft are like 9 year olds who downloaded a modded client thinking that it was the legit client. And proceeded to hack. Either that or they're just n00bs who want attention and a good K/D for no reason.
